CustomField.formula:
IF(FLOOR(( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24) < 1, "", Text( FLOOR(( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24))
&"hr ") &Text(
FLOOR((( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24 - FLOOR(( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24))* 60))
&"min "&Text(
FLOOR((( ( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24 - FLOOR(( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24 )) * 60 - FLOOR((( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24 - FLOOR(( CreatedDate - Feedback_Response__r.CreatedDate ) * 24 )) * 60 )) * 60 )) & "sec"
CustomField.label: Elapsed Time
